  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception
      Take a list of files as arguments and compile them (check syntax, check types, generate 3A code and convert it to C)
      Parameters:
      args - List of files to compile (-v or --verbose can also be used to display compilation steps
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is a syntax error, a type error or a problem while reading the files

    • getFileNameAndLineNumber

      public static String getFileNameAndLineNumber(org.antlr.runtime.tree.CommonTree node)
      Get the file name and line number of a node in the corresponding file (useful for error messages)
      Parameters:
      node - The node to get the file name and line number from
      Returns:
      The file name and line number of the node
